hadiths.text: Narrated `Abis bin Rabi`a:`Umar came near the Black Stone and kissed it and said "No doubt, I know that you are a stone and can neither benefit anyone nor harm anyone. Had I not seen Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) kissing you I would not have kissed you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا ذُكِرَ فِي الْحَجَرِ الأَسْوَدِ
chapter.eng-name: What is said regarding the Black Stone
